texts.name: Vanessa
texts.biography: Vanessa is one of the bravest fairies in the land. She leads her grassland cousins on some of the most daring missions, inspiring them to greatness in battle.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of Fays or Fairies or each level attained after 1st level.
specialty.tooltip:
{Fairies}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of Fairies or Grassland Fairies
specialty.name: Fairies
